qa.name: Alice
qa.appearance: Blonde hair with a blue dress
qa.clothing: Blue dress with a white apron

hf.name: Big Bad Wolf
hf.appearance: Large, grey wolf with sharp teeth

tr.name: Cinderella
tr.clothing: Sparkling blue ball gown and glass slippers

json_to_edit.voice_over: Once upon a time, fairy tales decided to take a stroll in our world.
json_to_edit.description: Fairy tale characters appear in a bustling modern city, causing chaos and wonder.
json_to_edit.weather: Sunny with magical sparkles in the air
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Traffic noise, gasps of surprise, magical tinkling
json_to_edit.name: Fairy Tale Invasion
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Fairy tale characters suddenly appear in a modern city, interacting with the real world.

qa.action: A swirl of colorful magic engulfs the city skyline.

hf.action: Alice appears in the middle of a busy intersection, looking confused and amazed.

tr.action: Alice's wide-eyed expression as she sees cars for the first time.

xc.action: The Big Bad Wolf emerges from an alley, startling pedestrians.

ka.action: People flee as the Big Bad Wolf chases them down the street.

fn.sfx_keywords: glass slipper clinking, gasps of awe
fn.action: Cinderella gracefully walks down the sidewalk, leaving glass footprints.

af.action: Onlookers take photos of Cinderella with their smartphones.

qo.action: The Big Bad Wolf tries to blow down a parked car like a house.

fp.action: Alice, Cinderella, and the Big Bad Wolf gather in a town square as more fairy tale characters appear.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: Once upon a time, fairy tales decided to take a stroll in our world.
updated_json.description: Fairy tale characters appear in a bustling modern city, causing chaos and wonder.
updated_json.weather: Sunny with magical sparkles in the air
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Traffic noise, gasps of surprise, magical tinkling
updated_json.name: Fairy Tale Invasion
updated_json.scene_summary: Fairy tale characters suddenly appear in a modern city, interacting with the real world.

qa.action: A swirl of colorful magic engulfs the city skyline.

hf.action: Alice appears in the middle of a busy intersection, looking confused and amazed.

xc.action: The Big Bad Wolf emerges from an alley, startling pedestrians.

fn.sfx_keywords: glass slipper clinking, gasps of awe
fn.action: Cinderella gracefully walks down the sidewalk, leaving glass footprints.

af.action: Onlookers take photos of Cinderella with their smartphones.

fp.action: Alice, Cinderella, and the Big Bad Wolf gather in a town square as more fairy tale characters appear.

label.rationale: we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, without changing anything else. this means we'll remove shots with keys "tr", "ka", and "qo" from the "shots" dictionary. we'll also update the "list_display_order" to reflect these removals. the "number_of_shots" will be updated from "9" to "6" to reflect the new total. all other elements of the json will remain unchanged.
